rule_regulation: Section 5(1)(b)(iv) of the Patented Medicines (Notice of Compliance) Regulations
application_details: alleging that no claim for the medicine itself or its use would be infringed by the second person
evidence_presented: evidence did not establish that Apotex would directly or indirectly infringe the patent, nor induce others to infringe it
decision_reasoning: issuing an NOC to Apotex would not result in infringement of the '668 patent
result_of_case: application was dismissed, allowing Apotex to proceed with obtaining an NOC without proving infringement
